opt.name: ReadRestoreNormals
opt.label: Conform Normals
opt.description: Make orientations of faces consistent - all face normals are facing inwards or out relative to the common shell

opt.name: ReadVerticesAsCoP
opt.label: Load Aux Vertices as Point Cloud
opt.description: Load all auxiliary vertices as one point cloud

opt.name: NBordReadVerticesAsCoP
opt.label: Number of Vertices
opt.description: The minimum number of auxiliary vertices to be loaded as point cloud

opt.name: ReadSolids
opt.label: Solid Bodies
opt.description: Translate manifold solid B-Rep object data

opt.name: ReadAuxiliaryUI
opt.label: Load Auxiliary Geometry
opt.description: Load geometrical objects that do not participate in forming model bodies

opt.name: ReadRefSrf
opt.label: Load Auxiliary Surfaces
opt.description: Load surfaces that do not participate in forming model bodies

opt.name: ReadRefCrv
opt.label: Load Auxiliary Curves
opt.description: Load curves that do not participate in forming model bodies

opt.name: ReadRefPt
opt.label: Load Auxiliary Points
opt.description: Load points that do not participate in forming model bodies

opt.name: ReadAuxPMI
opt.label: Load Auxiliary Annotations
opt.description: Load auxiliary annotations and driving dimensions

opt.name: ReadShowAllPMIDlg
opt.label: Load All Annotations as Visible
opt.description: Make all loading annotations visible regardless of their visibility flags

opt.name: ReadShowAllPMI
opt.label: Load All Annotations as Visible Default
opt.description: Load All Annotations as Visible Default

opt.name: ReadErrorLevel
opt.label: Error Level
opt.description: Specifies error types to be logged

opt.name: ReadPmiJoinShared
opt.label: Join Shared Annotations
opt.description: Join annotations linked to different model objects

opt.name: RepairPmiRemoveUnrecognizedDimension
opt.label: Remove Unrecognized Dimensions
opt.description: Remove dimensions with nominal values that do not correspond to feature parameters

opt.name: ReadPmiGroup
opt.label: Group Annotations
opt.description: Allow grouping of annotations associated with the same model entities

opt.name: ReadPmiToleranceAlwaysVisible
opt.label: Tolerance Always Visible
opt.description: Show tolerances of translated dimensions regardless of the original presentation

opt.name: ReadPmiConvertReferenceDimensionInfo
opt.label: Convert Prefix and Suffix to the Reference type of Dimension
opt.description: Convert Prefix and Suffix to the Reference type of Dimension

opt.name: ImprovePmiLinks
opt.label: Improve annotation links: remove links on inappropriate features, reconnect annotations from auxiliary geometry to the model geometry
opt.description: Improve annotation links: remove links on inappropriate features, reconnect annotations from auxiliary geometry to the model geometry

opt.name: PmiReplaceEdgeByFace
opt.label: Reconnect from Edges to Faces
opt.description: Reconnect annotations from the edge features to the face features

opt.name: ReadPmiRemoveDimPhantom
opt.label: Ignore Phantom Dimensions
opt.description: Ignore 'phantom' dimensions that are used to build leader lines for datums

opt.name: ReadPmiMultipleLeaders
opt.label: Annotations with multiple leaders
opt.description: This option controls use of annotation multiple leaders - separate leaders to every linked model object

opt.name: ReadAssemblyExtend
opt.label: Load assembly in extend mode
opt.description: This option controls the translation of the assembly in extend mode

opt.name: ReadManufacturing
opt.label: Manufacturing Information
opt.description: Manufacturing features such as hole data

opt.name: ReadParasolidClubAllSheets
opt.label: Club All Sheets
opt.description: Group all faces in a single body.

opt.name: ReadSolidWorksPMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadC4OnlyRoot
opt.label: Only Root
opt.description: Translate all or only root Catia V4 entities. The entities in a Catia V4 file are managed in the form of hierarchy. From this hierarchy, the Catia V4 Reader determines a set of entities classified as root entities. Set this option to Yes to enable reading of root entities only. Set this option to No to enable reading of all entities for translation.

opt.name: ReadC4OnlyMasterWorkspace
opt.label: Only Master Workspace
opt.description: Translate workspaces from a Catia V4 file

opt.name: ReadC4DittoBodies
opt.label: Ditto Bodies
opt.description: Translate space-ditto entities from Catia V4

opt.name: ReadC4KeepAnalyticalSrf
opt.label: Keep Analytical Surface Definition
opt.description: Use analytic surface definition stored in a Catia V4

opt.name: ReadC4ExpExtractWithoutTranslation
opt.label: Extract Catia V4 *.model from *.exp
opt.description: Extract and store Catia V4 model files

opt.name: ReadC43DCurvePref
opt.label: 3D Curve Preffered
opt.description: This option sets the preference to be used when generating trimmed curves for a surface. The preference can be 2D or 3D. Set this option to true to set the preference to 3D curves when generating trimmed curves for a surface. If you set this option to false, 2D curves are used.

opt.name: ReadC43DCurveRegen
opt.label: 3D Curve Regenerated
opt.description: This option controls the regeneration of 3D curves. At times, a Catia model file may contain both 2D curves and 3D curves. If you set this option to true, 3D curves from the Catia V4 file are used for translation. If you set this option to false, 3D curves from the Catia V4 model file are not used for translation and the 3D curves are generated using the surface and 2D curve information.

opt.name: ReadC5PMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadC5InWorkObject
opt.label: Load "In Work Object"
opt.description: Translate geometry from "In Work Object" state and not from the final state

opt.name: ReadC5RevolveSrfAsNURBS
opt.label: Revolved Surfaces as NURBS
opt.description: This option sets whether to translate revolved surfaces from Catia V5 files as NURBS (Non-Uniform Rational B-spline Surfaces)

opt.name: ReadC5ImportEdgeAttr
opt.label: Read edge attributes
opt.description: Reading of edge level attributes from Catia V5 might take long time. This option indicates whether to read the edge attributes from Catia V5 file. Set this option to true to read edge attributes from Catia V5 file. If this option is set to false, the edge attributes from Catia V5 file are not read for translation.

opt.name: ReadC5DiamAsLinear
opt.label: Represent diameter dimension as linear
opt.description: This option specifies the way of representation for diameter dimensions. If this option is true then diameter dimensions will be represented as linear dimensions.

opt.name: ReadSATPMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadUGPMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadUGVisibleLayerOnly
opt.label: Visible Layers Only
opt.description: Specifies whether only visible or all layers shall be imported.This option is not supported for assemblies.

opt.name: ReadUGAddMultBodiesInSamePart
opt.label: Multi-Body to One Part
opt.description: Specifies whether a multi-body model shall be imported as a single part or separate parts. If you set this option to true, a multi-body model will be translated to a single part, otherwise to separate parts.

opt.name: ReadProEPMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadProAsmFlat
opt.label: Read Creo assembly as flat structure
opt.description: Read Creo assembly as flat structure

opt.name: ReadInventorAllStates
opt.label: All States
opt.description: Translate unfolded sheet bodies. If this option is set to No, only the folded bodies are translated. If this option is set to Yes, both the folded and unfolded bodies are translated.

opt.name: ReadSTEPPMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadIGESPMI
opt.label: PMI
opt.description: Product Manufacturing Information (geometric dimensions and tolerances, 3D notes and dimensions, surface finish, and material specifications...)

opt.name: ReadAcrossBorderIges
opt.label: Allow Surface Boundary Crossing
opt.description: Allow trim contours to cross surface boundaries (it violates IGES format)

opt.name: WriteSetOfFace
opt.label: Write Solid as Set of Faces

opt.name: KeepSourceFormat
opt.label: Save command (Ctrl+S)
opt.description: Keep source format when the Save command (Ctrl+S) is being performed. If the corresponding translator is not activated (no license) file will be saved in the native Capvidia XML format.

opt.name: AutoSaveTimeInterval
opt.label: Time Interval
opt.description: Save after specified time (in minutes) is passed

opt.name: AutoSaveOpInterval
opt.label: Operation Interval
opt.description: Save after specified number of operation are performed

opt.name: WriteC4SolidAsSolide
opt.label: Solids as 'SOLIDE'
opt.description: This option controls the translation of multi-shell solids from the target as SOLIDE or VOLUMEs in Catia V4. If you set this option to Yes, a multi-shell solid is written as a single SOLIDE having many SOLIDDEF. Set this option to No to translate multi-shell solids from the target as multiple VOLUMEs in Catia V4.

opt.name: WriteC43DCurves
opt.label: 3D Curves
opt.description: Specifies whether 3D representation of trimming edges shall be written (optional for Catia V4 format)

opt.name: WriteC4ModelDimension
opt.label: Model Dimension
opt.description: This option sets the model dimension field in a Catia V4 model file. The unit for specifying the model dimension field is millimeter.

opt.name: WriteC4Author
opt.label: Author
opt.description: Author name to write in Catia V4 file

opt.name: WriteC4Modelname
opt.label: Model Name
opt.description: Model name to write in Catia V4 file

opt.name: WriteAsmCreateFolder
opt.label: Assembly in Separate Folder
opt.description: Write assembly files in a new sub-folder

opt.name: WriteAsmInOneFile
opt.label: Assembly in One File
opt.description: Save all assembly components in one file (producing a multi-body model)

opt.name: WriteC5AsmType
opt.label: Write Assembly Type
opt.description: Setting this option to Aggregate creates sub-assemblies as Catia V5 components in the resultant file without any CATProduct files associated with them.

opt.name: WriteParasolidFaceId
opt.label: Keep Face ID
opt.description: Write original face IDs in attributes

opt.name: WriteStepPMIRepresentation
opt.values: 203/214|203/214 with Annotations as 3D Edges|203/214 with Annotations as Presentation Only|242
opt.label: Application Protocol

opt.name: WriteStepP21
opt.label: Write String in P21 Format
opt.description: This option controls format of string data in step file

opt.name: WriteSplit23Nurbs
opt.label: Split NURBS Surfaces by Outer Loop
opt.description: Split NURBS Surfaces by Outer Loop

opt.name: WriteSplit13Nurbs
opt.label: Split NURBS Curves by Bound Parameters
opt.description: Split NURBS Curves by Bound Parameters

opt.name: WriteIgnoreOuterLoop
opt.label: Ignore Outer Loop Coincident with Surface Bounds
opt.description: Ignore Outer Loop Coincident with Surface Bounds

opt.name: WriteSeparateAssembly
opt.label: Assembly as Separated Parts
opt.description: Split assembly and write as separated parts

opt.name: WriteVrmlForVMBuilder
opt.label: Additional Information
opt.description: Write additional information (WCS, source file name)

opt.name: WriteQIFasMesh
opt.label: Convert parametric to mesh
opt.description: Convert parametric faces to mesh faces

opt.name: WriteModePly
opt.label: Mode
opt.description: This option specifies a mode of writing.
